categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order
Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This very old Jedi was the Jedi Master of Shayoto some time before 4800 BBY. This Jedi lived many centuries, and his master lived for hundreds of years as well, having lived through the Hundred-Year Darkness in 7000 BBY and the Great Hyperspace War two thousand years later.
